Author: isthised
Text: I haven’t been eating enough of my meal plan but it feels like a shit ton and definitely normal to me anyways. And I’m kind of excited but terrified to weigh in this week and see if I’ve lost, gained, or maintained. It would be cool to lose and know that I could maybe try the full meal plan without being so worried about gaining.

Author: thomel02
Text: Same here! I'm eating 3 meals and 3 snacks and I actually haven't gained a pound. I'm somewhat frustrated because I feel like I'm eating 24/7 and I can't possibly eat anymore. My body apparently doesn't agree though...more food it is. I do love trying new things, though, and my mood has been much improved, despite the intense guilt I feel over eating so much more. It's crazy how much an eating disorder twists things!
